Huntington.Union Township, Lawrence County, Ohio:
Union Township is one of the fourteen townships of Lawrence County, Ohio, United States. The 2000 census recorded 9,002 people in the township, 7,540 of whom lived in the unincorporated portions of the township.


== Geography ==
Located in the southeastern part of the county along the Ohio River, it borders the following townships:
Windsor Township – north
Rome Township – east
Fayette Township – west
Lawrence Township – northwest corner
Cabell County, West Virginia lies across the Ohio River to the south.
